alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 9:28AM CDT until April 14 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River At Edinburg. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 21.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 13.8 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Pearl River Edinburg 20.0 21.3 Thu 8 am CDT 19.8 18.2 16.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 830 PM CDT.
